lead_paragraph: The billionaire businessman behind Beanie Babies learned Tuesday that he won't go to prison for hiding at least $25 million from U.S. tax authorities, and the judge who gave him two years' probation instead went to great lengths to praise his charitable giving.

headline.main: Beanie Babies Maker Avoids Prison for Tax Evasion
headline.print_headline: Beanie Babies Maker Avoids Prison for Tax Evasion
